channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Red Hat Satellite 6.11 for RHEL 7
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Red Hat Satellite 6.11 for RHEL 7

item.title: CVE-2023-0118|2024-08-02T05:02:43.821Z -- red%20hat -- red%20hat%20satellite%206.11%20for%20rhel%207
item.description: An arbitrary code execution flaw was found in Foreman. This flaw allows an admin user to bypass safe mode in templates and execute arbitrary code on the underlying operating system.
